sent.orig: The follow-up study now being reported is known as FLEX, for FIT-Term Extension.
sent.trans: 该项跟踪性试验报道的名称为“FLEX”或FIT长期延展性试验。

sent.orig: A man has his clothes made to fit him; a woman makes herself fit her clothes.
sent.trans: 埃德加·沃森·豪：男人让衣服适合他，女人让自己适合衣服。

sent.orig: Fit men and old men in small small Fit has it?
sent.trans: 大男人小飞度和老男人小飞度有关系吗？

sent.orig: Research on interference fit riveting, composites structure riveting and driving interference-fit fastener have been done.
sent.trans: 对电磁铆接技术在干涉配合铆接、复合材料结构铆接、干涉配合紧固件安装方面的应用进行了系统研究。

sent.orig: A fIt'staff means a fit company. Fundamentally we are animals. We need to exercise.
sent.trans: 健康的员工意味着健康的公司。从根本上讲，人是动物，他们需要锻炼。
